entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this morning except a few flurries inland. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
